mapper.select: SELECT no as no, title as title, member_id as name, indate as indate, count as count FROM (SELECT no, title, member_id, indate, count, like_count, popularity FROM post WHERE indate >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY, '%Y%m%d') AND category = #{category}) ps WHERE count > 100 AND like_count > 10 ORDER BY popularity DESC LIMIT 5
